query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
1 Godi, Fiorenza, poi che se’ sì grande 2 che per mare e per terra batti l’ali, 3 e per lo ’nferno tuo nome si spande!
query.error: **English:** 1 Rejoice, Florence, since you are so great 2 that you beat your wings over sea and land, 3 and your name spreads even through hell!
query.result: 1 Lowen, Florença, pub ty a’s kemmys bras 2 dre vor ha tir, ow t’eyth esel, 3 ha’th hanow a-lewyr dre’n ifarn!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
4 Tra li ladron trovai cinque cotali 5 tuoi cittadini onde mi ven vergogna, 6 e tu in grande orranza non ne sali.
query.error: **English:** 4 Among the thieves I found five such 5 of your citizens that I am ashamed of it, 6 and you do not rise in great honor from it.
query.result: 4 Ynter an ladhres y’m kavos pymp avel 5 a’th sythoryon, ow t’am gwrians, 6 ha ty yn enor bras nyns a-wrug.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
7 Ma se presso al mattin del ver si sogna, 8 tu sentirai, di qua da picciol tempo, 9 di quel che Prato, non ch’altri, t’agogna.
query.error: **English:** 7 But if one dreams of the truth near dawn, 8 you will hear, before long, 9 of what Prato, not to mention others, yearns for you.
query.result: 7 Mes pub owth ogas dhe’n gwir y’n kows, 8 ty a glewsi, a-dhia dhe’n termyn byghan, 9 a-dro dhe’n tra Prato, nyns owth aral, a-wuns dhiso.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
10 E se già fosse, non saria per tempo. 11 Così foss’ ei, da che pur esser dee! 12 ché più mi graverà, com’ più m’attempo.
query.error: **English:** 10 And if it were already, it would not be too soon. 11 If only it were, since it must be! 12 For it will weigh on me more, the longer I wait.
query.result: 10 Ha pub veu ena, nyns veu rag termyn. 11 Mar veu ena, pub drehev veu! 12 Rag moy a-wrug war’n vy, kepar ha moy a-wrug kottha.

Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.

Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
